meanings.definition: A feeling of uneasiness or discomfort.
meanings.sent1: The sudden qualmishness in his stomach made him stop eating.
meanings.sent2: Her qualmishness before the big test was evident in her fidgeting.
meanings.sent3: The qualmishness he felt before the roller coaster ride was unfounded.
meanings.sent4: The qualmishness of making a difficult decision weighed heavily on her mind.
meanings.sent5: The qualmishness in the room was palpable, making everyone uneasy.

meanings.definition: Causing or experiencing nausea or queasiness.
meanings.sent1: The strong smell of fish was qualmishness to her sensitive nose.
meanings.sent2: The bumpy boat ride left him feeling qualmishness for hours.
meanings.sent3: The qualmishness inducing ride made her regret eating a big lunch.
meanings.sent4: The qualmishness atmosphere of the haunted house added to the spooky experience.
meanings.sent5: The taste of the medicine was so qualmishness that he almost gagged.
